beginning: Draw a number of cards equal to the least eyes on any played card
end: If your deck is empty, take 10 gold
title: Heiress

beginning: Use the powers on the lowest rank played green card
end: Earn 5 gold
bonus: If you have this in play when another player wins the auction, you may take 1 of your exiled cards into your hand
title: Pawn

beginning: Earn 10 gold
end: Move the leftmost card in your deck to the right side
title: Thief

beginning: Draw 1 for each card in the dungeon
end: Put 1 pawn from the bank on trial
title: Radical

beginning: Use the powers on the lowest rank yellow played card
end: Earn 1 silver
bonus: If you have this in play during the auction, you may bid silver
title: Guildmaster

beginning: If the 2 lowest rank cards in the center are the same color, earn the higher rank in coins
end: Swap the leftmost and rightmost cards in your deck
title: Princess

beginning: Draw the highest rank card in your deck
end: Move the highest rank card in your deck to the left side
title: Diplomat

beginning: Draw 1
end: Put 1 pawn from the bank on the left side of your deck
title: Conspirator

beginning: Take 1 pawn from the bank into your hand
end: Draw a number of cards equal to the most eyes on any played card
title: Sheriff

beginning: If anyone played a card ranked lower than 9, take 1 of your exiled cards back into your hand
end: Draw the number of colors on the played cards
title: Duellist

beginning: Use the powers on the lowest rank non-red played card
end: Use the powers on the lowest rank non-red card in the dungeon
bonus: If you have this in play during the auction, your bid is increased by 10
title: Pirate

beginning: Put 1 pawn from the bank on the right side of your deck
end: Draw a number of cards equal to the lowest rank in the dungeon
title: Hostage

beginning: Draw 2
end: Take 1 of your exiled cards into your hand
title: Widow

beginning: Use the powers on the rightmost yellow card in your deck
end: Use the powers on the highest rank green played or dungeon card
bonus: If you have this in play when you win an auction, you may take any of the cards you win directly into your hand
title: Warrior

beginning: Use the powers on the rightmost non-red card in your deck
end: Use the powers on the lowest rank non-red card in the center
bonus: If you have this in play when you win an auction, you may take cards from the dungeon as well as the trial
title: Lawyer

beginning: Use the powers on the lowest rank yellow card in the center
end: Use the powers on the highest rank yellow played or dungeon card
bonus: If you have this in play when you win an auction, you may take any number of cards from the dungeon into your hand
title: Revolutionary

beginning: Use the powers on the lowest rank card in the center
end: Use the powers on the highest rank non-red card in the dungeon
bonus: If you have this in play when another player wins the auction, you may take any number of your exiled cards into your hand
title: Heretic

beginning: Pay the rank of the rightmost card in your deck to the bank in coins
end: Earn 25 gold
title: Alchemist

beginning: Earn 5 gold for each color on the played cards
end: Earn the lowest rank on a yellow played card, including this, in coins
title: Icon

beginning: Earn 20 gold
end: Exile 1 card from your hand
title: Assassin

beginning: If there is a yellow played card, including this, earn 20 gold
end: Earn 5 gold for each of your exiled cards
title: Pope

beginning: Earn 5 gold for each card in the dungeon
end: Earn the highest rank in the dungeon in coins
title: Blackmailer

beginning: If the rightmost card in your deck is yellow, earn twice its rank in coins
end: Move the rightmost card in your deck to the left side
title: Smuggler

beginning: Earn the rank of lowest green played card in gold and silver
end: Draw 3
title: General

beginning: If the rightmost card in your deck is green, draw 5
end: If the lowest or highest rank played card, draw 5
title: Regent

beginning: If you have 50 or less gold, draw 5
end: If you have 5 or less cards in your deck, draw 5
title: Saint
